data.actual_result: The window is not covering the whole vertical Client, leaving a grey bar. You can see the color of the Member list and scroll chat with it
data.expected_result: After re-entering the DM, the Screenshare window is covering the whole vertical Client
data.short_description: Grey bar under expanded Screenshare/Video window when in a Group DM
data.steps_to_repro: - Create a Group DM with your two (or more) best friends and start a call - Have one User Video- or Screenshare and expand the feed via the button on the bottom left - Go to a different DM/Server and then come back to one with Expanded Feed - Observe
